sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using ThiSo, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

sections.title: 2. Use of Service
sections.content: You agree to use ThiSo only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the website.

sections.title: 3. Intellectual Property
sections.content: The content on ThiSo, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of ThiSo or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright laws.

sections.title: 4. User Contributions
sections.content: By submitting content to ThiSo, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, and worldwide license to use, modify, publicly perform, publicly display, reproduce, and distribute such content.

sections.title: 5. Disclaimer of Warranties
sections.content: ThiSo is provided "as is" without any representations or warranties, express or implied.

sections.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: ThiSo will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service.

sections.title: 7. Changes to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Your continued use of ThiSo after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms of Service.

sections.title: 8. Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
